Mooseprints Web Design empowers small businesses, nonprofits, and community-focused organizations to tell their story with affordable hand-crafted websites. Whether you're running a local business, supporting underserved communities, or showcasing your talent as a local artist, Mooseprints helps you deliver your message effectively to achieve your mission.

Steps to building

your perfect website

From our first call to the final delivery, you'll be involved every step of the way to ensure your vision is at the heart of every decision. With clear and frequent communication, we'll work together to create a website that drives results and reflects your mission.

This timeline outlines the key steps in the process of building your perfect website, from initial consultation to the final delivery.

Initial consultation

We'll have a free 30-minute call to discuss your project and goals, and take a look at your current website if you have one. We'll explore whether my services would be a good fit with no pressure to commit.

Research & planning

I'll review your website in depth if you have one (or any other informational materials), and research your field or cause. Based on my research and our initial consultation, I'll craft a detailed and specific plan for your new website. Expect about 3-5 days for this phase.

Second consultation

We'll have a second free 30-minute call to discuss the proposed website plan. Once you have made the decision to move forward — whether that's during our call or after — I'll send over a contract for your signature and an invoice for a $100 non-refundable deposit.

Design & development

Once we're under contract, I'll begin building your website. You'll provide all text copy and images needed. During this time, I may reach out with questions, but otherwise will work independently until the revision phase. Allow 2-3 weeks for an initial version to be completed.

Revisions

Once the initial version of the website is complete, we'll schedule another call or communicate via email to begin revisions. I offer unlimited revisions until you're happy with the final product.

Transaction & subscription

Once you've given the green light on the final product, I'll send an invoice for the work based on our contract. As soon as payment has been received, I'll deliver the source code for the website. At this time, you may decide if you'd like to subscribe to an optional hosting & maintenance plan with me.

Let's bring your vision to life!

Ready to create a website that showcases your passion and connects with your audience? Book a free consultation today and let’s make it happen together.
